product_name: Rip Curl Drift Midnight Watch - Men's
long_description: The Rip Curl Drift Midnight Watch delivers signature surf style and performance. Under a wetsuit or under a shirt sleeve, it's perfect for your adventures on land and water. Digital readout features dual time, date, stopwatch, countdown timer, backlight and alarm. Thin, light and high-impact ABS plastic case, stainless-steel top bezel and comfortable polyurethane strap are durable enough to handle all the elements. The Rip Curl Drift Midnight Watch resists water to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The Rip Curl Drift Midnight Watch delivers signature surf style and performance. Under a wetsuit or under a shirt sleeve, it's perfect for your adventures on land and water.
